website_summaries.verdict: Tons of heat settings to find the perfect temperature for each hair type.
pros: Straightens hair 33% faster than other brands
30 different settings for fine, thin, wavy, normal,  thick, or damaged hair
cons: Too lightweight for very thick hair types

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This feels incredibly lightweight, like a toy version of a straightener, compared to my prior versions by Solia, Solano, etc. I didn't like how it made my hair feel and I didn't trust that it would last. Also I did not like the cord, which is fabric coated. Makes it difficult to clean if it touches the sink, etc. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It's just a solid choice all around. It's much faster than my old straightening iron, both in heating up and that I only need 1 or 2 quick passes per hair bundle to get what I'm going for. I've had no issues and I highly recommend this iron. I love the color too. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Seloske

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful flat iron. I would recommend over and over again. I have very thick natural hair and it straightened it like I have never seen it before. It is so silky. I live in the tropics and my hair is not afraid to frizz and revert. It has been 10 days and I still have silky pressed hair. I use a silk scarf to tie my hair every night which I think has helped with the longevity of the style. I am not disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, doesn’t pull hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this item for over a year and still going strong. Good quality, doesn’t pull hair, very smooth and does a great job without burning my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the temperature dial.
customer_reviews.text: It was lightweight but because of the temperature dial it is very hard to know what temperature u are at so i find this to be dangerous.If u have fragile hair u could easily burn it and thats not good.It actually did some damage to mine idk if its too late to return so maybe it will be a back up. I think if they updated to a digital temp. display it would be great but i like the pearl version better.
customer_reviews.author: kiki tharrington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this! I always had hair straighteners with a lower price point but they never made me happy. So this one finally does. It gets warm very quickly and cools down as well quickly. Does a great job on my thick hair ! And I only use it mid temperature. So if you have very resistant hair just use it on higher numbers. Overall it's been a dream so far to have this .
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My hair is difficult to straigten, most straighteners won’t work. This one is a different story! It’s quick and easy to use and gets my hair perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely  recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this flatiron! It’s easy to store with the clip and velcro strap and the travel case makes it easy to transport immediately from use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Dering

customer_reviews.title: happy happy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. The iron gets hot almost instantly and fits my hand perfectly. Smooths hair in one swipe and my hair is coarse so that's important.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hrezo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Im not really straight my hair so offten but if i have to this iron is works well.
customer_reviews.author: Fruzsina Pokol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Uses it almost everyday and it's still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! Make sure to clean it & take care of it for best use & longer life! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Yuli

customer_reviews.title: Lovely. Does everything its supposed to do, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Does everything its supposed to do, but if your hair is very curly you'd probably have to use it in a very high temprature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as my $100 Chi straightener for a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Feero

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Flat Iron ever had! I can have my hair done in few minutes! it's very powerfull I loved
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Florez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight easy to use iron! Definitely recommend over more expensive flat irons. :)
customer_reviews.author: Myan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant straightener, very quick and easy to sue, and leaves hair shiny and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I order it as blush pink but came in white
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: The smell is terrible. And it is not even near as good ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is terrible. And it is not even near as good as the chi I had for 12 years. It DOES LEAVE FRIZZ do not be fooled. Not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad straightener for the price. I do like Remington products
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good straightener for the price. I'm still switching between this one and my old one. I have problems with frizz, especially in humidity and it almost seems to dry my hair out a little which is not what I expected based on the hype in advertising which intrigued me into buying it. I'm also a little confused by the dial. I think I have it on the lowest setting but maybe it's just the opposite and that's why it seems drying. The dial is hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Churchlady R

customer_reviews.title: Why this warning?
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I would to ask why this product has this warning, my wife and me are very worried because she is pregnant.... please somebody tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar O.

customer_reviews.title: i bought it and it didn't work i bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought it and it didn't work i bought it open box but i didn't know that it will come without it's protective pouch it didn't heat up and the light led did not even turn on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used to buy high end products
customer_reviews.text: My mother used to only buy top dollar products and spend hundreds on hair straighteners. Then, I moved out on my own and said no way I'm dropping that much on a hair tool. I ordered this as my first Remington flat iron and am very happy with it! I have thick wavy hair and can easily style my hair on a medium setting. It gets hot very quick, shuts off when I think I'm going to come back for touch ups and forget, and leaves my hair smooth and no frizzles. The bag it comes with and swivel cord is really nice too! Oh & it doesn't snag hair or anything. I would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN

customer_reviews.title: I’m sold!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this straightener for curling light beach waves! The placement of the on off button as well as the dial for temperature is fantastic! I had the pearl prior but it was really hard to curl with because I would constantly hit the temperature buttons without knowing it. I’m not a huge fan of the fabric wrapped cord but it doesn’t make or break it for me. I actually ended up keeping this and returning a Chi because I felt this one was easier to curl with. I did like the chi for straightening however I rarely straighten my hair (minus getting the waves out prior to curling) overall I’m really pleased with this flat iron!
customer_reviews.author: Dws

customer_reviews.title: incredible with curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I am extremely satisfied with the quality of such an affordable product. My previous Remington straightener lasted about four years. After doing some research, this one seemed to be a good fit for me. Pros: heats up in 30 seconds, adjustable temp (I use the highest heat), thin and sleek, travel case, doesn't get caught in hair, straightens in one swipe (sometimes ill do the roots twice) My hair is naturally thick and curly. I section my hair and straighten (right over the curls, i dont' brush them) and it takes appx 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I had a CHI flat iron that lasted 10 years...when I used it in Europe with a converter/adaptor it fizzled out. I wanted to try something less expensive and with heat setting adjustments. I like this even better than my CHI! It really does straighten in one pass and I don't even use it on the highest setting. My hair stays shiny and smooth. It also has an auto turn off and a lock so you can close it when it's not in use.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like that there is no "off" button
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that there is no "off" button. I am just supposed to take for granted that it will shut off on its own? Nope. It smelled horrible and made my hair smell horrible. It was frying the ends of my hair really bad in just the short amount of time I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Marybeth Bell

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and functional
customer_reviews.text: This straightener is lovely, I love the blush pink color with the rose gold trim. I was kind of skeptical at first as I am used to having a digital display vs a dial, but this is not a big issue for me anymore. Straightener works great and gets hot quite fast. I do wish that the cord was a bit longer and was less thicker - the thickness of the cord makes it somewhat of an annoyance to maneuver at times. Overall, great product and very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Nga

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this flat iron. It works better then the chi I replaced it with. Super smooth plates and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. It heats up very fast and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Clemento M.

customer_reviews.title: Great straightener
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the straightener for several weeks now and I love it. It pulls my hair less than any other straightener I've had plus I can get through my curly hair fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Rohrbouck

customer_reviews.title: ... because it says pro lol so it must be good right? I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it says pro lol so it must be good right? I love it! It heats up super fast and it straightens really good!! And the color is pretty.I am so Not returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a while, but now it won't stay on for more than a minute at a time. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CKVA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love it it doesnt make my hair static and makes it look smooth
customer_reviews.author: Tamara W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works great on extra thick & super curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A.

customer_reviews.title: I've had better flat irons but i do enjoy this one
customer_reviews.text: I've had better flat irons but i do enjoy this one. I have thin hair so it does work i just find it a little big and bulky. While i flat iron my hair the heat temp does go very high which is needed for some i keep it at a medium temp so i don't fry my hair. This is a good deal for the price. I have the matching blow dryer so thats the main reason why i purchased this flat iron to match.
customer_reviews.author: Kissezamour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use .. my wife is very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not pink or blush at all, maybe a pearl white?
customer_reviews.author: richard greene

customer_reviews.title: I like the travel case that comes with though
customer_reviews.text: The plates don't line up unless you squeeze it together. I like the travel case that comes with though. I'm going to return it an order a different one
customer_reviews.author: BP

product_meta.title: Remington Pro 1" Flat Iron with Thermaluxe Advanced Thermal Technology, Blush Pink, S9110S
product_meta.description:
You’re just one pass away from straightened, radiant hair that lasts!* The Remington Pro 1" Flat Iron with Thermaluxe Advanced Thermal Technology contains 10x more ceramic**, keeping hair healthy and smooth after each styling session. Advanced Thermal Technology optimizes heat levels to prevent damage while quickly transforming hair into the all-day*** straightened styles you love! The 1” plates are perfect for detailed styling and the “floating” design keeps them in constant contact with hair for consistent styles. Other features include: 450° high heat, 15-second heat-up, 30 heat settings, 60-minute auto shutoff, 4-year limited warranty.

*varies by hair type and technique
**vs standard Remington straightener
***styles shown to last 24 hours in laboratory trials
feature_bullets: Optimized Heat Levels for Healthy Styles
30 Heat Settings - Find the perfect heat for your hair type, with 30 different settings for use on fine, regular, or thick hair

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
